title: Ticket #1708: PHP Notice:  Undefined variable:  local_fs_prefix
description:
This error is arising on the Apache server logs with our PHP build and test pages that the Condor Development Group maintains. 

[client 128.105.48.144] PHP Notice:  Undefined variable:  local_fs_prefix in
/var/www/html/results/Run-condor-taskdetails.php on line 98, referer:
http://nmi-s006.cs.wisc.edu/results/Test-history.php?branch=trunk&test=lib_unit_tests-1

It needs fixing.
creator: psilord
